definitions: the quality of moving fast or doing something in a short time

examples.text: an athlete with outstanding quickness and agility

shortDefinitions: quality of moving fast or doing something in short time

definitions: the quality of being prompt to understand, think, or learn

examples.text: his quickness of mind gained him the respect of all parties

shortDefinitions: quality of being prompt to understand or learn

definitions: the quality of a person's temper being easily roused

examples.text: his quickness of temper involved him in many controversies

shortDefinitions: quality of person's temper being easily roused
